name: Cupcake Heaven - The Delicious Cake Catch Game!
name_original: Cupcake Heaven - The Delicious Cake Catch Game!
description:
Things are heating up in the kitchen! Cut, slice, slash and dash your way through over 50 levels of baking insanity! It's time to corner those cupcakes and you'll need quick fingers and sharp thinking to make sure the cupcakes don't escape...

Set to an awesome action soundtrack with epic graphics, this classic slash game will keep you entertained for hours.

It's action-packed baking excitement, playing with your food has never been this fun!
